channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Anthropic hires lawyers as it preps for IPO
item.description: Anthropic is reportedly prepping for an IPO that could come as early as 2026.

item.title: Cette sonde fête ses 30 ans et elle est devenue l’instrument solaire le plus productif de l’histoire : voici ce qu’elle a vu
item.description: Le 2 décembre 1995, l’Agence spatiale européenne (ESA) et la Nasa lançaient Soho, l’Observatoire solaire et héliosphérique. Les données qu’il a renvoyées en 30 ans ont révolutionné le regard que les astronomes posent sur notre Étoile. Et même un peu plus…

item.title: "A disaster waiting to happen" – The privacy tech world reacts to the new Chat Control bill
item.description: While an agreemnet on "voluntary" chat scanning has now been reached, Italy, the Czech Republic, Poland, and the Netherlands are still against the compromise. And privacy experts aren't celebrating.

item.title: Pour réduire leur dépendance à la Chine, les industries européennes bientôt contraintes de se fournir en partie en Europe ?
item.description: Des biens critiques, jusque-là fournis par la Chine, seraient bientôt obligatoirement fabriqués en Europe : c'est l'idée d'une future loi européenne qui sera présentée le 10 décembre prochain à Bruxelles. Elle pourrait contraindre nos industries à s'approvisionner obligatoirement auprès d'entreprises du Vieux continent, dans certains secteurs clés. Reste à définir les seuils, les composants et les produits concernés : autant d'éléments sur lesquels la Commission européenne resterait divisée....

item.title: Thursday's Cold Moon Is the Last Supermoon of the Year. Here's How and When to View It
item.description: The best opportunity to view this spectacle will be shortly after sunset on December 4.

item.title: Liverpool vs Sunderland live streams: watch Premier League 2025/26 match
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Liverpool vs Sunderland in the Premier League this Wednesday, as Arne Slot looks for successive EPL wins.

item.title: Noté 9/10 et séduisant avec sa dalle incurvée QD-OLED 34″ à 240 Hz, cet écran Dell perd plus de 200 € de son prix
item.description: Dell fait une promotion plus intéressante que pendant le Black Friday sur l'écran Alienware AW3425DW qui se retrouve à 641,39 euros au lieu de 849 euros sur le site de Dell.

item.title: The annual app recaps for 2025: all Wrapped up
item.description: Spotify may have popularized the Wrapped user recap trend, but more companies are jumping on that bandwagon every year. From rival music streaming providers like Apple, Amazon, YouTube, and Deezer, to completely unrelated services across tech, gaming, and other industries, a huge range of companies are using fun visuals, stats, and personalization features to show […]...

item.title: How to watch 2025 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo online: live stream event from anywhere
item.description: It's all eyes on Sin City for the 'Super Bowl of rodeo' – here's how to watch 2025 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo live streams no matter where in the world you are.

item.title: « C’est un choix de vie » : le Galaxy Z TriFold est lourd, cher, mais fascinant
item.description: Est-ce qu'on assiste à la mort de la tablette ? C'est la question que l'on se pose devant le nouveau Galaxy Z TriFold de Samsung. Le constructeur coréen concrétise enfin son rêve : un smartphone qui se déplie en trois volets. C'est impressionnant, c'est bourré de technologies comme le Snapdragon 8 Elite, mais attendez de voir le poids de la bête.

item.title: This new Honeywell Home smart thermostat can answer your Ring doorbell
item.description: Resideo’s newest thermostat looks like a compelling alternative to Nest or Ecobee if you’re looking for a premium smart thermostat. The Honeywell Home X8S is compatible with Matter, supports room sensors, and features a sleek 5-inch touchscreen that works as an intercom for Ring and First Alert video doorbells. The $219.99 thermostat launches this week, and […]...

item.title: ExpressVPN's latest update boosts connection speeds and revamps its Mac app
item.description: ExpressVPN launched two major updates: a new 'Fastest Location' feature and a native macOS app that aim to deliver a quicker and more seamless user experience.

item.title: Amazon has a massive sale on best-selling gifts - here are the 21 best from Apple, Keurig, Ninja, and more
item.description: Amazon has a huge holiday sale on best-selling Christmas gift ideas, and I'm rounding up my 21 favorite deals from Apple, Ninja, Keurig, Tonies, and more.

item.title: I tested the MSI Cubi NUC AI+ 2MG and it's perfectly placed if you want a simple productivity mini PC with onboard AI
item.description: The MSI Cubi NUC AI+ 2MG is a pint-sized productivity machine with a surprisingly great port offering, ideal for those out-of-sight machines that run multiple displays, share content over large displays in a lobby or on a sign, or on a front desk.

item.title: Après la colère des fans, Amazon retire l’atroce doublage IA de plusieurs anime
item.description: Ridicule, embarrassant, insultant : les qualificatifs n'ont pas manqué de fuser chez les fans d'anime quand Amazon s'est piqué de proposer un doublage IA de plusieurs séries japonaises. Comme chacun aurait pu le prévoir, c'est une catastrophe et après les cris d'horreur des fans et des comédiens de doublage, l'entreprise a fait marche arrière.

item.title: Google Drive : la fonction qu’on attendait tous arrive
item.description: C'est le cauchemar de tout le monde : un dossier Google Drive rempli de 50 PDF aux noms incompréhensibles. Google a enfin la solution. L'entreprise déploie une fonctionnalité qui utilise Gemini pour résumer le contenu de tout un dossier en une seconde.

item.title: An unsettling indie game about horses keeps getting banned from stores
item.description: Horses, a first-person narrative horror game, was banned from the Epic Games Store just hours before it was set to launch on December 2nd. Then, a day after launch, the Humble store banned it as well. The decision shocked the developers at Santa Ragione, makers of the critically respected Saturnalia, as these storefronts were the […]

item.title: One day, AI might be better than you at surfing the web. That day isn’t today.
item.description: All I wanted was a pair of New Balances. I was done trusting stylish influencers who swore Vans, Converse, and Allbirds were up to the challenge of walking 20,000 steps day in and day out. They are not. Fall is the season of holiday sales, so there's no better time to shop… if you're immune […]

item.title: Arsenal vs Brentford live streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Arsenal vs Brentford in the Premier League this Wednesday from anywhere in the world.

item.title: A leading kids safety bill has been poison pilled, supporters say
item.description: Last year, the House of Representatives was the place where a leading kids online safety bill came to die. On Tuesday, a powerful House committee positioned itself as the place where that bill could be resurrected… along with 18 other proposals. During a three-hour hearing, an Energy and Commerce subcommittee discussed 19 bills recently packaged […]...

item.title: These PS5 and Xbox controller accessories revolutionized my gaming experience – and are perfect gift material this holiday
item.description: These simple and cheap PS5 controller accessories have changed the way I game - and can be yours for less right now.

item.title: Google Home : le ménage continue et supprime une fonction que les utilisateurs adoraient
item.description: C'est une habitude détestable chez Google, mais on ne s'y fait jamais. Vous utilisiez votre smartphone pour appeler en vidéo le Nest Hub de votre cuisine pour parler aux enfants ? C'est fini. Sans annonce, sans notification, Google a supprimé cette fonction de l'application Google Home. Et le plus frustrant, c'est que ce n'est pas un bug.

item.title: Cartes graphiques Nvidia : les meilleurs modèles GeForce en 2025
item.description: Les cartes graphiques Nvidia sont les références du marché. Vous êtes intéressés par un GPU de la marque, mais hésitez sur le modèle à choisir ? Frandroid vous explique tout ce qu'il y a à savoir sur les meilleures cartes graphiques de Nvidia.

item.title: Netflix celebrates Kpop Demon Hunters' Spotify Wrapped 2025 success with heartfelt HUNTR/X 'thank you' message – but some fans think it was made by AI
item.description: Spotify Wrapped 2025 reveals how popular Kpop Demon Hunters' soundtrack really was, and HUNTR/X want to thank you for your support.

item.title: Wake Up Dead Man still isn’t on Netflix yet – but a better new Knives Out mystery is streaming now
item.description: Benoit Blanc and Knives Out take on the world of Sesame Street on Netflix this week, and we're inching ever closer to a full-on Muppets movie.

item.title: A Snorkeler in Nova Scotia Thought This Was a Leaf, but It Was Something Far Weirder
item.description: Studying Elysia chlorotica could be consequential for human industries, but the creatures have proven incredibly enigmatic.

item.title: Iranian hacker group deploys malicious Snake game to target Egyptian and Israeli critical infrastructure
item.description: MuddyWater has deployed more sophisticated techniques and malware in a string of attacks targeting Israel and Egypt.

item.title: Will chatbots ever be funny? Why these comedians aren’t worried about an AI takeover, yet
item.description: Although comedian Jon Lajoie uses AI in his work, he says AI chatbots aren’t ‘inherently funny.’ A baby and his family dog sit across from each other in a podcast studio.“Welcome to the talking baby podcast,” says the infant, wearing headphones and sounding like a deep-voiced radio broadcaster. “On today’s episode, we’ll be talking to the weird-looking person who lives at my house.”So begins a series of humorous interactions between two characters animated by artificial intelligence that’s attracted millions of views on social media. They’re a nod to the 1989 movie “Look Who’s Talking” but pro...

item.title: Grab a free Fortnite skin with your Backbone Pro
item.description: Backbone Pro owners can claim a free Fortnite skin right now.

item.title: Elon Musk is on a racist posting spree again
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk — who’s long used his X (formerly Twitter) platform to stoke anger at immigrants and support antisemitic conspiracy theories — has spent the past day spreading and praising claims that “White people are on the verge of extinction,” Somali immigrants have “no right to be in America,” and nonprofits who support them are […]

item.title: AWS doubles down on custom LLMs with features meant to simplify model creation
item.description: AWS is launching more capabilities in both Amazon Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker AI to make building custom models easier.

item.title: Big screen TV deal still live: Get a 75-inch Hisense QLED 4K TV for under $400
item.description: The Hisense 75-inch E6 Cinema QLED 4K TV is still on sale for $399.99 post-Cyber Monday. That's 25% off its usual cost.

item.title: Que se passe-t-il si le Galaxy Z TriFold est plié dans le mauvais sens ?
item.description: C’est officiel, le nouveau smartphone pliant Samsung vient d’être annoncé. Le Galaxy Z TriFold est le premier téléphone à double pliage de la marque. Mais alors dans quel sens devra-t-on plier ce nouveau smartphone pour être sûr de ne pas l’abimer dès les premières utilisations ?

item.title: En rupture de stock sur le site officiel, le Xiaomi Poco M7 Pro 5G (12 + 512 Go) est dispo et en promo à -40 % sur Amazon
item.description: Le Poco M7 Pro 5G est un téléphone d'entrée de gamme qui propose une configuration solide pour un prix abordable de 169 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 283 euros dans sa version 12 + 512 Go.

item.title: Linux usage on Steam hits a record high for the second month in a row
item.description: After finally passing the 3 percent mark in October, Linux usage on Steam has peaked again in the November Steam Hardware & Software Survey. As of last month, Linux users accounted for 3.2 percent of all Steam users. That pales in comparison to Windows usage (94.79 percent), but it’s still a boost from October and […]

item.title: Supercharge your weekly clean with the iRobot Roomba 105 robot vacuum, still on sale now
item.description: As of Dec. 3, get the iRobot Roomba 105 robot vacuum for $150.99 off at Amazon.

item.title: Russian Cosmonaut Kicked Off SpaceX Mission Over Alleged National Security Violation
item.description: The incident could strain Roscosmos’s partnership with NASA as the agency finds itself more reliant on the U.S. than ever.

item.title: The Trump Administration Wants Immigrants to Self-Deport. It’s a Shit Show
item.description: The Trump administration has been virtually begging immigrants in the US to self-deport, even offering money. But some immigrants say it’s been nearly impossible.

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about Eventbrite’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: I’ve tested the latest Switch 2 controllers, and this one is the best
item.description: If you choose to get an extra controller for your Nintendo Switch 2, you can spend a lot — and get a lot in return. Buying Nintendo’s own $89.99 Switch 2 Pro Controller, for instance, will net you the console’s only wireless controller with a 3.5mm headphone jack, not to mention great rumble, OS-level rear […]

item.title: Nows your chance to get the PlayStation VR2 "Horizon Call of The Mountain" Bundle for a record-low price
item.description: The PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of The Mountain Bundle is on sale at Amazon for $299, down from the list price of $399.99. That's a 25% discount.

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un excellent casque JBL Tour One M3
item.description: L'excellent casque JBL Tour One M3 reviendra gratuitement à la personne qui remportera le concours du 3e jour de notre calendrier de l'Avent 2025 #FrandroidOffreMoi.

item.title: Another bid to block state AI regulation has failed… for now
item.description: Republicans’ attempt to ban state AI regulations was removed from the defense bill after bipartisan opposition, underscoring tensions between tech-industry demands, consumer protection concerns, and Trump’s push for sweeping federal preemption.

item.title: Laifen Goes All-In for Post Black Friday With 40% Off Its Best-Selling Hair Dryers, Toothbrushes, and Shavers
item.description: Laifen’s Black Friday sale shaves 40% off its highly-rated products, but the stock might sell out soon.

item.title: Test du MacBook Pro 14 M5 : de quoi me faire abandonner mon MacBook Air
item.description: Nouvelle année, nouveau MacBook Pro. Si la puce M5 fait encore des miracles en 2025, c'est toujours l'écran de ce modèle qui nous bluffe chaque année. Voici notre test du dernier MacBook Pro avant la grande refonte attendue de 2026.

item.title: Garmin’s new satellite communicator adds a touchscreen and photo sharing
item.description: Garmin announced a new version of its inReach satellite communicator with major upgrades that expand and improve the ways you can keep in touch while you’re adventuring outside cellphone coverage. The new inReach Mini 3 Plus now features a color display with touchscreen capabilities and adds voice messaging, longer text messages, and the ability to […]...

item.title: Trop de promesses mal tenues : les entreprises n’achètent pas l’IA de Microsoft
item.description: Microsoft a du mal à vendre son IA auprès des entreprises. Beaucoup d'entre elles sont toujours réticentes à acheter des services IA, car la fiabilité n'est pas forcément au rendez-vous. Résultat : le géant du logiciel ainsi que d'autres éditeurs auraient revu les ambitions de leurs commerciaux à la baisse pour refléter la réalité de l'engouement tout relatif des clients....

item.title: Character.ai launches Stories to keep teens engaged as it scales back open-ended chat for under-18s
item.description: Character.ai is phasing out open chat for teens, and Stories is its plan to keep them entertained.

item.title: The Characters Who Helped Us Survive 2025
item.description: Here's to the terrific, the unpleasant and vindictive, the singers, and other characters who enchanted us throughout 2025.

item.title: Sony is slowly improving the ergonomics of its cameras, but it’s still not enough
item.description: I was stoked to learn that the recently announced Sony A7 V had improved ergonomics. Just like I was happy to first hear that Sony's flagship A9 III and A1 II cameras got new ergonomic grip designs before that. I actually bought an A9 III to replace my aging A9 II for my wedding photography. […]

item.title: Google Photos’ 2025 Recap turns to Gemini to find your highlights
item.description: The Google Photos Recap will use Gemini's AI to find your memorable moments throughout the year, and adds new metrics, like a 'selfie' count.

item.title: The search for missing Malaysian Airlines Flight MH370 is back on. Here’s what to know
item.description: Investigators are still unable to pinpoint exactly what happened to the plane or its 239 passengers and crew. More than a decade ago, Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 vanished without a trace, sparking one of aviation’s most baffling mysteries.Despite years of multinational searches, investigators still do not know exactly what happened to the plane or its 239 passengers and crew.On Wednesday, Malaysia’s government said American marine robotics company Ocean Infinity would resume a seabed hunt for the missing plane on Dec. 30, reigniting hopes that the plane might finally be found.A massive sear...

item.title: Amazon Fire TV’s new AI feature lets you jump to scenes by describing them to Alexa+
item.description: Amazon says you can describe the scene to Alexa by mentioning details like the actor or character's name, or a memorable quote.

item.title: The final 3 best Cyber Monday laptop deals still alive
item.description: Our editor found the final three laptop deals still live after Cyber Monday. Score the M4 MacBook Air, Alienware gaming PC, or a budget Chromebook for up to $350 off.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs thermostats connectés en 2025 ?
item.description: Ces dernières années, les prix du gaz et de l'électricité ont explosé. Il est ainsi devenu urgent de réduire notre impact écologique et nos factures. Les thermostats intelligents sont des alliés de choix pour faire des économies d'énergie. Découvrez notre sélection des meilleurs thermostats connectés.
